displayProperties.name: ACD/0 Feedback Fence
displayProperties.description: The Active Contact Defense system uses warsat hull materials to store a retaliatory charge.

displayProperties.name: Actium War Rig
displayProperties.description: Conflict Resolution Solution #3479: Leave them to rest wherever they may fall.

displayProperties.name: Aeon Safe
displayProperties.description: "We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons

displayProperties.name: Aeon Soul
displayProperties.description: "We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons

displayProperties.name: Aeon Swift
displayProperties.description: "We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons

displayProperties.name: An Insurmountable Skullfort
displayProperties.description: BRAINVAULT Sigma-ACTIUM-IX Cranial Dreadnought (Invincible Type)

displayProperties.name: Antaeus Wards
displayProperties.description: Do you believe in the Gaiaforms, the energies within planets?

displayProperties.name: Apotheosis Veil
displayProperties.description: Most helmets protect the mind from the universe. Not this one.

displayProperties.name: Arbalest
displayProperties.description: "We didn't have linear fusions in the Dark Age. But we made it work." —The Drifter

displayProperties.name: Armamentarium
displayProperties.description: For this, there is one remedy.

displayProperties.name: Ashen Wake
displayProperties.description:
“It is your turn. These people will follow you to the very end. Remember that we were forged in Light.”
 —Aodh, Second Empyreal Magistrate of the Sunbreaker

displayProperties.name: Assassin's Cowl
displayProperties.description: Now you see me. Now you don't.

displayProperties.name: Astrocyte Verse
displayProperties.description: The ideocosm contained within this helm transforms the wearer's head from flesh and/or exoneurons to the pure, raw stuff of thought.

displayProperties.name: Black Talon
displayProperties.description: "His life brought peace to the Reef. His death brings a sword." —Crows of the Black Hull

displayProperties.name: Celestial Nighthawk
displayProperties.description: Starlight is your guide. No vacuum will contain you.

displayProperties.name: Cerberus+1
displayProperties.description: "Because three heads are good, but four are better." —Jeza "Jeopardy" Verlayn

displayProperties.name: Chromatic Fire
displayProperties.description: "…found them… Crystal Orchards of Dione… requesting backup… coordinates to follow…" —Last transmission of Fireteam Pergamon

displayProperties.name: Claws of Ahamkara
displayProperties.description: The mind is malleable, filled with transient and fleeting ideas. Let us shape it, so that you may see the infinite splendor of the universe.

displayProperties.name: Coldheart
displayProperties.description: The latest Omolon engineering leverages liquid fuel as coolant to keep weapon systems at biting subzero temperatures.

displayProperties.name: Contraverse Hold
displayProperties.description: "Nothing is free. I know that. Therefore, he knows it too. If our places were swapped, he would do the same." —Tomek I

displayProperties.name: Crest of Alpha Lupi
displayProperties.description: Whoever survives our passing does so only by our consent.

displayProperties.name: Crimson
displayProperties.description: According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.

displayProperties.name: Crown of Tempests
displayProperties.description: Mighty are they of the stormcloud thrones, and quick to anger, but bounteous to those whom they love.

displayProperties.name: D.A.R.C.I.
displayProperties.description: Thank you for using the Data Analysis, Reconnaissance, and Cooperative Intelligence device. You may call me Darci.

displayProperties.name: Doom Fang Pauldron
displayProperties.description: Nobody calls it that.

displayProperties.name: Dunemarchers
displayProperties.description: Whether on solid rock or shifting sand dune, the inexorable Sand Eaters never slow their pace.

displayProperties.name: Eternal Warrior
displayProperties.description: Absolute, unflinching resolve.

displayProperties.name: Exotic Engram
displayProperties.description:
An engram with a predestined outcome.

Contains a new Exotic if any remain to be collected; otherwise, it contains a random piece of Exotic armor.

itemTypeAndTierDisplayName: Contains a new exotic if any remain to be collected.

displayProperties.name: Eye of Another World
displayProperties.description: When the universe conspires, its enemies cannot hide.

displayProperties.name: Fighting Lion
displayProperties.description: "I call it the Zhang Fei. It hits almost as hard as I do." —Wei Ning

displayProperties.name: Five of Swords
displayProperties.description:
Is it a portent of victory, or warning of overconfidence?

Enables modifiers in Nightfall strikes. More challenging modifiers apply larger score multipliers.

displayProperties.name: Foetracer
displayProperties.description: "I see you."

displayProperties.name: Fr0st-EE5
displayProperties.description: "Hey, if it works for computers…" —Marcus Ren

displayProperties.name: Gemini Jester
displayProperties.description: "I love making people laugh. And by 'people,' I mean me. Haha!" "Haha! Me!"

displayProperties.name: Geomag Stabilizers
displayProperties.description: "The hurricane will overtake you. It's inevitable. Take stability where you can get it." —Ikora Rey

displayProperties.name: Getaway Artist
displayProperties.description: Keep the engine running.

displayProperties.name: Graviton Forfeit
displayProperties.description: "Doesn't matter how good you are—you stay out there too long, you're not coming back. Not the same way you left, anyway." —Tevis

displayProperties.name: Graviton Lance
displayProperties.description: Think of space-time as a tapestry on a loom. This weapon is the needle.

displayProperties.name: Gwisin Vest
displayProperties.description: "The Traveler called me back. Told me my work on this side isn't done yet." —Seong-Do Whiteclaw

displayProperties.name: Hallowfire Heart
displayProperties.description: "You who seek the Forge: your journey will be long, but your destination is closer than you think." —Ouros

displayProperties.name: Hard Light
displayProperties.description: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

displayProperties.name: Heart of Inmost Light
displayProperties.description: On the cusp between life and light, between death and destruction.

displayProperties.name: Helm of Saint-14
displayProperties.description: "He walked out into the demon light. But at the end he was brighter." —Paean to Saint-14

displayProperties.name: Karnstein Armlets
displayProperties.description: “You are mine, you shall be mine, you and I are one for ever.”

displayProperties.name: Khepri's Horn
displayProperties.description: "I pushed the sun. I can push you, too." —Inscription inside the helm

displayProperties.name: Khepri's Sting
displayProperties.description: The wound is not deep, but you know it exists—and that is enough.

displayProperties.name: Knucklehead Radar
displayProperties.description: You can see the point, right? Who wants to team up with one?

displayProperties.name: Liar's Handshake
displayProperties.description: Look 'em in the eye.

displayProperties.name: Lion Rampant
displayProperties.description: All expect that you should rouse yourself, as did the former lions of your blood.

displayProperties.name: Lord of Wolves
displayProperties.description: By this right alone do I rule.

displayProperties.name: Lucky Pants
displayProperties.description: "What? No, I didn't illegally mod the holster. These are just really lucky pants!" —Cayde-6

displayProperties.name: Lucky Raspberry
displayProperties.description:
> No one has ever died wearing me.
# It's true. She leaves the unworthy before they fall.

displayProperties.name: Lunafaction Boots
displayProperties.description: "I thank you for the gift of these atoms. I will use them well." —The Stoic

displayProperties.name: Mechaneer's Tricksleeves
displayProperties.description: "This won't end well for one of us. And darling, it won't be me." —Self-styled "Lady" Olu Alderdice

displayProperties.name: Merciless
displayProperties.description: Entropy is inevitable.

displayProperties.name: Mk. 44 Stand Asides
displayProperties.description: Pardon me. Coming through.

displayProperties.name: Monte Carlo
displayProperties.description: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

displayProperties.name: Nezarec's Sin
displayProperties.description: "He is that which is an end. And he shall rise again." —passage from Of Hated Nezarec, a pre-Golden Age text.

displayProperties.name: Oathkeeper
displayProperties.description: "I have not yet met my true death." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

displayProperties.name: One-Eyed Mask
displayProperties.description: An eye for an eye.

displayProperties.name: Ophidia Spathe
displayProperties.description: Listen carefully when the serpent speaks, for its tongue is forked, and its words have two meanings.

displayProperties.name: Ophidian Aspect
displayProperties.description: "Have I the aspic in my lips?"

displayProperties.name: Orpheus Rig
displayProperties.description: Never, ever, look back.

displayProperties.name: Peacekeepers
displayProperties.description: Designed for the seamless delivery of justice in an unjust world.

displayProperties.name: Peregrine Greaves
displayProperties.description: Victory from on high.

displayProperties.name: Phoenix Cradle
displayProperties.description: For some, a nest. For the rest, a crucible.

displayProperties.name: Phoenix Protocol
displayProperties.description: Do not grieve the dying star. Its death kindles newer life, and thus the wheel turns again.

displayProperties.name: Prometheus Lens
displayProperties.description: "Cryptarchs made a crystal that starts fires? Get me one. I don't care how you do it. Go!" —Cayde-6

displayProperties.name: Promethium Spur
displayProperties.description: Pass the torch. Spread the fire.

displayProperties.name: Raiden Flux
displayProperties.description: Interfaces with synapses (or nearest equivalent) to draw electric power directly from the wearer's body.

displayProperties.name: Riskrunner
displayProperties.description: Charge your soul and let the electrons sing.

displayProperties.name: Sanguine Alchemy
displayProperties.description: There is power in blood.

displayProperties.name: Sealed Ahamkara Grasps
displayProperties.description: Plating the Ahamkara bones in silver helps to quiet the auditory hallucinations… o bearer mine.

displayProperties.name: Severance Enclosure
displayProperties.description: The loop is made. Over and over until the collision. At that moment, severed fission.

displayProperties.name: Shards of Galanor
displayProperties.description:
"Galanor is beyond my skill to repair."
"…I can work with this."

displayProperties.name: Shinobu's Vow
displayProperties.description: "No supplies. Armor in tatters. But the refugees had asked for help. And she had given her word." —Tale of the Six Coyotes

displayProperties.name: Skull of Dire Ahamkara
displayProperties.description: Reality is the finest flesh, oh bearer mine. And are you not…hungry?

displayProperties.name: Skyburner's Oath
displayProperties.description: The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Victory or death!"

displayProperties.name: St0mp-EE5
displayProperties.description: "I call them the Stompies! For when your legs need that extra kick." —Marcus Ren

displayProperties.name: Starfire Protocol
displayProperties.description: 13.4 billion years ago, the first stars kindled out of darkness, seeding the future of all life.

displayProperties.name: Stormdancer's Brace
displayProperties.description: After all, isn't lightning better outside the bottle?

displayProperties.name: Stronghold
displayProperties.description: I am a shield unto myself.

displayProperties.name: Sunbracers
displayProperties.description: "When one can wield the fire of stars, what use is flesh and bone?"

displayProperties.name: Sunshot
displayProperties.description: "Can't outrun the sunrise." —Liu Feng

displayProperties.name: SUROS Regime
displayProperties.description: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

displayProperties.name: Sweet Business
displayProperties.description: "…I love my job."

displayProperties.name: Synthoceps
displayProperties.description: Caution: the organism has been known to develop consciousness. In these cases, immediate termination is recommended.

displayProperties.name: Telesto
displayProperties.description: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

displayProperties.name: The Bombardiers
displayProperties.description: "Tallulah Fairwind never turns down a dare." —Tallulah Fairwind

displayProperties.name: The Colony
displayProperties.description: We outnumber you. We will find you. You are alone, and we are colony.

displayProperties.name: The Dragon's Shadow
displayProperties.description: "It is my honor." —Chalco Yong to Ikora Rey

displayProperties.name: The Huckleberry
displayProperties.description: Nothin' in the world that 30 rounds can't solve.

displayProperties.name: The Jade Rabbit
displayProperties.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

displayProperties.name: The Prospector
displayProperties.description: "Some things should stay buried."

displayProperties.name: The Queenbreaker
displayProperties.description: Despite the Breakers' treachery, Her Majesty still stands.

displayProperties.name: The Sixth Coyote
displayProperties.description: "You wanna use your old name, that's fine by me. Just don't tell anyone." —Micah-10 to Himura Shinobu

displayProperties.name: The Stag
displayProperties.description: Only bones for your feast. Only death for my victory.

displayProperties.name: The Wardcliff Coil
displayProperties.description: Ingenuity. Desperation. A haphazard prototype of terrible power. Such were the factors at play in the Wardcliff Incident.

displayProperties.name: Thunderlord
displayProperties.description: They return from fields afar. The eye has passed, the end nears. Do not fade quietly. Let thunder reign again.

displayProperties.name: Tractor Cannon
displayProperties.description: Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.

displayProperties.name: Transversive Steps
displayProperties.description: Your relationship with consistent spacetime is...tenuous at best.

displayProperties.name: Trinity Ghoul
displayProperties.description: "I couldn't afford to miss. Not when it was his life on the line." —Marin Mansanas, Tangled Outrider

displayProperties.name: Two-Tailed Fox
displayProperties.description: Adorably murderous.

displayProperties.name: Ursa Furiosa
displayProperties.description: "Stay back. I won't tell you again." —Bjorna-3

displayProperties.name: Verity's Brow
displayProperties.description:
"The Hive do not see how we see. They look beyond, into the infinite. Into the dark."

—Eris Morn

displayProperties.name: Vesper of Radius
displayProperties.description: "Drawn like so, the Rift circle reinscribes planetary energy as a destructive force." —Ikora Rey, "On Circles, Volume 12"

displayProperties.name: Vigilance Wing
displayProperties.description: "The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance

displayProperties.name: Wavesplitter
displayProperties.description: Omolon's newest breakthrough uses focused sonic waves to superheat electrons into a devastating energy beam.

displayProperties.name: Wings of Sacred Dawn
displayProperties.description: There will come a day when the light will never fade.

displayProperties.name: Winter's Guile
displayProperties.description: "I know you." —Lord Felwinter

displayProperties.name: Wormgod Caress
displayProperties.description:
"Have you ever stared into the green soulfire flame? There is terror, but also… something warm."
—Eris Morn

displayProperties.name: Wormhusk Crown
displayProperties.description: We strive to know infinity, and sharpen our minds on the whetstone of the impossible.

displayProperties.name: Young Ahamkara's Spine
displayProperties.description: Give me your arm, oh bearer mine. Let me help you fill the world with teeth.
